content: Glad that you're all having a good time in Chicago. (I miss MAAB.) A long-planned family vacation prevented me from being there will you guys, too. Thanks for the links...I like the 50-70 rule article...will digest the Web 2.0 decks next. Was the SaaS content SaaS or "S + S" as Charles Fitzgerald and others at MSFT talk about it? Cheers!
